description.en:
This manhwa is about a boy Yoon, Ah-so who's staying with his aunt while his parents go to live in a different country. As soon as his parents leave, Ah-so transforms himself from a nerd with glasses to a novice player with dyed hair. His aunt's place turns out to be next door to his girl classmate Na, Ban-di's house. Ban-di has a best friend Kang, Shi-ool, a girl who may or may not like Ban-di as more than a friend. There are two other guy classmates, Na, Mashi and Shin, Sae-ba, who are also pretty close. The story explores the relationship between these characters.

---

description.ko:
짜잔~등장인물 소개코너~ 윤아소 : 범생이 인생 17년만에 초보 날라리로 대변신 사반디 : 아마추어 점술가. 어린왕자같은 사랑을 기다리는중 ♡ 강시울 : 남자로 태어나지 못한 게 한인 톰보이 걸! 그외 등장인물 : 나마시, 신새바, 추실솔 주인공을 능가하는 엑스트라들의 파릇파릇한 청춘 보고서

biography.en: Kim Jea-eun passed away on June 2, 2011, after being hospitalized a few days before openly stating that she had cancer.
